p: Total carotenoids were quantified using UV/visible spectrophotometry (Biochrom Libra S22 UV/Vis spectrometer, Guibeville, France). Absorbances were measured at 450 nm using n-hexane as a blank. Carotene concentration in each extract was calculated via a calibration curve previously obtained using a pure standard of β-carotene (>98%). The carotene yield was expressed as g (β-carotene) per 100 g of dry matter (%).
